title: ShadowBox Practice - Easy
subtitle: Start with the basics. This easy shadowbox session focuses on fundamental movements and proper form.

steps.text: Begin in your boxing stance. Feet shoulder-width apart, knees slightly bent, hands up in guard position. Take a deep breath and relax.

takeaways: Focus on form over speed - perfect technique builds the foundation for power.
Keep your guard up at all times, even when moving.
Breathe naturally and stay relaxed - tension wastes energy.

title: ShadowBox Practice - Medium 1
subtitle: Build on the basics with combinations and more complex footwork patterns.

steps.text: Start with jab-cross combinations. Jab with your lead hand, then cross with your rear hand. Focus on hip rotation and proper weight transfer.

takeaways: Combinations should flow naturally - each punch sets up the next.
Defense and offense work together - always be ready to defend after attacking.
Footwork creates opportunities - use movement to find better angles.

title: ShadowBox Practice - Medium 2
subtitle: Advanced combinations and defensive techniques to challenge your skills.

steps.text: Practice advanced combinations: jab-cross-hook-cross. Focus on timing and rhythm. Each punch should flow into the next with proper hip rotation.

takeaways: Advanced combinations require perfect timing - practice slowly before increasing speed.
Body shots open up head shots - mix your targets effectively.
Defensive counters can be your most effective offense - practice them regularly.

title: ShadowBox Practice - Advanced
subtitle: The ultimate challenge - complex combinations, advanced footwork, and high-intensity training.

steps.text: Master the 7-punch combination: jab, cross, lead hook, rear uppercut, lead uppercut, rear hook body, lead hook body. Execute with perfect form and speed.

takeaways: Complex combinations require hours of practice - start slow and build up gradually.
Advanced techniques only work if your fundamentals are solid - never sacrifice form for complexity.
High-intensity training builds both physical and mental endurance - push your limits safely.

title: ShadowBox Practice - Advanced 2
subtitle: Elite level training - master the most complex combinations and defensive movements.

steps.text: Practice advanced defensive movements. Combine slipping, rolling, and blocking in fluid sequences. Stay balanced and ready to counter at any moment.

takeaways: Elite techniques require perfect fundamentals - never skip the basics.
Advanced defense creates offensive opportunities - master both sides.
Consistency beats intensity - practice regularly with perfect form.
